channel.description: A Pokémon fan site dedicated to Centiskorch, a dual-type Fire/Bug Pokémon from the Galar region.

item.title: VGC law and disorder
item.description: I'm frustrated by the constant disorganisation of a competitive scene that has lived in some form for over 25 years. VGC should be better than this.

item.description: I got a lot of shinies yesterday so I'm writing about the experience.
